SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, SUBT2.* FROM ( SELECT SUBT1.* , ( SELECT SUB_CD_NM FROM ADM4100 WHERE LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND MST_CD = 'SRH00001' AND SUB_CD = SUBT1.LINK_TYPE_CD ) AS LINK_TYPE_NM FROM ( SELECT
A.PRJ_ID , A.DOC_ID AS LINK_ID , A.DOC_NM AS LINK_NM , ' ' AS LINK_SUB1_ID , ' ' AS LINK_SUB1_NM , ' ' AS LINK_SUB2_ID , ' ' AS LINK_SUB2_NM , B.ATCH_FILE_ID , B.ORIGNL_FILE_NM , B.FILE_SN , B.FILE_EXTSN , B.FILE_SIZE , B.REG_DTM , '01' AS LINK_TYPE_CD FROM PRJ3000 A INNER JOIN COMTNFILEDETAIL B ON ( A.DOC_ATCH_FILE_ID = B.ATCH_FILE_ID ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.USE_CD = '01' UNION ALL SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.DOC_ID AS LINK_ID , A.DOC_NM AS LINK_NM , ' ' AS LINK_SUB1_ID , ' ' AS LINK_SUB1_NM , ' ' AS LINK_SUB2_ID , ' ' AS LINK_SUB2_NM , B.ATCH_FILE_ID , B.ORIGNL_FILE_NM , B.FILE_SN , B.FILE_EXTSN , B.FILE_SIZE , B.REG_DTM , '02' AS LINK_TYPE_CD FROM PRJ3000 A INNER JOIN COMTNFILEDETAIL B ON ( A.DOC_FORM_FILE_ID = B.ATCH_FILE_ID ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.USE_CD = '01' UNION ALL SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.REQ_ID AS LINK_ID , A.REQ_NM AS LINK_NM , C.REQ_PRO_TYPE AS LINK_SUB1_ID , ' ' AS LINK_SUB1_NM , ' ' AS LINK_SUB2_ID , ' ' AS LINK_SUB2_NM , B.ATCH_FILE_ID , B.ORIGNL_FILE_NM , B.FILE_SN , B.FILE_EXTSN , B.FILE_SIZE , B.REG_DTM , '03' AS LINK_TYPE_CD FROM REQ4100 A INNER JOIN COMTNFILEDETAIL B ON ( A.ATCH_FILE_ID = B.ATCH_FILE_ID ) LEFT JOIN REQ4100 C ON ( A.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID AND A.REQ_ID = C.REQ_ID ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# UNION ALL SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.REQ_ID AS LINK_ID , B.ITEM_NM AS LINK_NM , F.REQ_PRO_TYPE AS LINK_SUB1_ID , D.PROCESS_NM AS LINK_SUB1_NM , C.FLOW_ID AS LINK_SUB2_ID , C.FLOW_NM AS LINK_SUB2_NM , E.ATCH_FILE_ID , E.ORIGNL_FILE_NM , E.FILE_SN , E.FILE_EXTSN , E.FILE_SIZE , E.REG_DTM , '04' AS LINK_TYPE_CD FROM FLW1300 A INNER JOIN FLW1200 B ON ( A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.PROCESS_ID = B.PROCESS_ID AND A.FLOW_ID = B.FLOW_ID AND A.ITEM_ID = B.ITEM_ID AND B.ITEM_CODE = '03' ) INNER JOIN FLW1100 C ON ( A.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID AND A.PROCESS_ID = C.PROCESS_ID AND A.FLOW_ID = C.FLOW_ID ) INNER JOIN FLW1000 D ON ( A.PRJ_ID = D.PRJ_ID AND A.PROCESS_ID = D.PROCESS_ID ) INNER JOIN COMTNFILEDETAIL E ON ( A.ITEM_VALUE = E.ATCH_FILE_ID ) LEFT JOIN REQ4100 F ON ( A.PRJ_ID = F.PRJ_ID AND A.REQ_ID = F.REQ_ID ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND B.USE_CD = '01' AND C.USE_CD = '01' AND D.USE_CD = '01' ) SUBT1 WHERE 1=1
UPPER(SUBT1.ORIGNL_FILE_NM) LIKE '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# )||'%'
SUBT1.LINK_NM LIKE '%'||#searchTxt#||'%'
SUBT1.LINK_TYPE_CD = #searchCd#
ORDER BY SUBT1.REG_DTM DESC ) SUBT2
